name: Chem VI
description: Bring your gas mask to race on this smoggy, overcrowded world.

name: Drakonis
description: The locals here are very fond of humans ... for dinner.

name: Bogmire
description: The swampy domain of Ragewortt, self proclaimed ruler of everything.

name: New Mojave
description: Prison planet of the galaxy, victory will not come easy here.
